intro:
It's a massive {{shuckleName}} and what appears
to be a large stash of... juice?
title: The Strong Stuff
description:
The {{shuckleName}} that blocks your path looks formidable. Meanwhile, the juice next to it emanates power of some kind.

The {{shuckleName}} extends its feelers in your direction. It seems like it wants to do something...

1.label: Approach the {{shuckleName}}
1.tooltip: (?) Something awful or amazing might happen

2.label: Battle the {{shuckleName}}
2.selected: Enraged, the {{shuckleName}} drinks some of its juice and attacks!

outro: What a bizarre turn of events.
